hiveauthservices.broadcastInstructions: Broadcasting your operation via HiveAuth, please review and approve from your compatible mobile wallet app.
hiveauthservices.qrInstructions: Please tap or scan the following QR code with your HiveAuth compatible mobile wallet app
hiveauthservices.tokenExpired: HiveAuth token expired, please try again..
hiveauthservices.userRejectedRequest: user has rejected the HiveAuth request
hiveauthservices.requestExpired: The HiveAuth request has expired, please try again...
hiveauthservices.verifyPostingKeyInstructions: 'Please use your HiveAuth compatible mobile wallet app to verify your posting key.'
hiveauthservices.publicKeyMatchingError: failed matching signature to public key

chainvalidation_js.have_only_letters_digits_or_dashes: должно должно состоять только из букв, цифр или дефисов.
chainvalidation_js.have_only_one_dash_in_a_row: иметь только одно тире в строке.
chainvalidation_js.verified_exchange_no_memo: Для перевода на биржу Вы должны указать примечание.
